DOC.brief_summary: A prospective , multicenter , interventional study collect confirmatory evidence safety effectiveness TactiCath® percutaneous ablation catheter treatment symptomatic paroxysmal atrial fibrillation use contact force assist irrigated radiofrequency ablation .
DOC.brief_title: TactiCath® Contact Force Ablation Catheter Study Atrial Fibrillation Continued Access Protocol
DOC.criteria: symptomatic PAF ( Paroxysmal Atrial Fibrillation ) refractory least one Class IIV antiarrhythmic drug minimum one document PAF episode > 30 sec duration within prior 12 month minimum three PAF episodes prior 12 month 18 year old persistent longstanding persistent AF ( Atrial Fibrillation ) four cardioversions prior 12 month MI ( myocardial infarction ) , CABG ( coronary artery bypass graft ) PCI ( percutaneous coronary intervention ) within precede 3 month leave atrial diameter > 5.0 cm LVEF ( leave ventricular ejection fraction ) < 35 % NYHA ( New York Heart Association ) class III IV previous leave atrial ablation procedure previous tricuspid mitral valve repair surgery
